name: Wordrl
description:
Short Rules

Play Wordle, play a roguelike, play this.

Long Rules
  • W,A,S,D / cursor keys to move.
  • Space / Enter to wait & discard letters.
  • 1,2,3 to cast spells.
  • Shoot letters by walking into them.
  • Your objective is to shoot the correct 4 letter word.
  • A white letter won't hurt you.
  • A letter turned green was in the right place.
  • A letter turned yellow was in the word but not in the right place.
  • A letter turned grey is not in the word.
